  A Gentle Introduction to Quarto.
  An introduction to Quarto, the next-generation scientific and technical publishing system.
abstract: |
  In this talk, I provide a gentle introduction to Quarto, an open-source scientific and technical publishing system built on Pandoc.
  Quarto allows you to create dynamic content with Python, R, Julia, and Observable, and publish high-quality articles, reports, presentations, websites, blogs, and books in HTML, PDF, MS Word, ePub, and more.
